notes:
Implemented Spectrogram primitive with all 10 test cases. Key implementation details:
- Renders frequency bands as vertical/horizontal bars using CanvasRenderer.drawLine() with configurable wobble
- Bar heights correspond to frequency magnitude (maps dB values -100 to 0 to normalized 0-1 range)
- Real-time reactivity via update()/render() pattern designed for animation loop integration
- Accepts ColorPalette from MoodMapper, uses primary color for normal bars, accent for peaks
- Intensity control (0-1) affects bar count (0.5x to 1.5x base count) and thickness
- Sketchy rendering via wobble option passed to drawLine (default 0.3)
- Graceful handling of no audio - shows flat/minimal bars, smooth transition when audio stops
- Supports horizontal and vertical orientations via setOrientation()
- Motion control (0-1) affects animation smoothness - uses interpolation for smooth transitions
- Text/visual mode controls opacity (visual=1.0, text=0.3) via hsla() color format
- Proper lifecycle with dispose() method to clean up resources
